name: Enabling RDP Service via Reg.exe
description: Detects the execution of reg.exe and subsequent command line arguments for enabling RDP service on the host by tampering with the 'CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server' subkeys
query: ((process.executable:/.*\\[Rr][Ee][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ [Aa][Dd][Dd]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\\[Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll][Ss][Ee][Tt]\\[Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\\[Tt][Ee][Rr][Mm][Ii][Nn][Aa][Ll]\ [Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ee][Rr].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Rr][Ee][Gg]_[Dd][Ww][Oo][Rr][Dd].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Ff].*/) AND ((process.command_line:/.*[Ll][Ii][Cc][Ee][Nn][Ss][Ii][Nn][Gg]\ [Cc][Oo][Rr][Ee].*/ AND process.command_line:/.*[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Cc][Oo][Nn][Cc][Uu][Rr][Rr][Ee][Nn][Tt][Ss][Ee][Ss][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss].*/) OR process.command_line:(/.*[Ww][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss]\\[Rr][Dd][Pp]\-[Tt][Cc][Pp].*/ OR /.*[Mm][Aa][Xx][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Nn][Cc][Ee][Cc][Oo][Uu][Nn][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Ff][Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Ww][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Ss][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr][Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Dd].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Ss][Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Dd].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Ss][Aa][Pp][Pp][Cc][Oo][Mm][Pp][Aa][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Ii][Dd][Ll][Ee][Ww][Ii][Nn][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Oo][Oo][Ll][Cc][Oo][Uu][Nn][Tt].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Ss][Aa][Dd][Vv][Ee][Rr][Tt][Ii][Ss][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Aa][Ll][Ll][Oo][Ww][Tt][Ss][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Ff][Ss][Ii][Nn][Gg][Ll][Ee][Ss][Ee][Ss][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn][Pp][Ee][Rr][Uu][Ss][Ee][Rr].*/ OR /.*[Ff][Dd][Ee][Nn][Yy][Tt][Ss][Cc][Oo][Nn][Nn][Ee][Cc][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Ss].*/)))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.executable:*\\reg.exe AND process.command_line:*\ add\ * AND process.command_line:*\\CurrentControlSet\\Control\\Terminal\ Server* AND process.command_line:*REG_DWORD* AND process.command_line:*\ \/f*) AND ((process.command_line:*Licensing\ Core* AND process.command_line:*EnableConcurrentSessions*) OR process.command_line:(*WinStations\\RDP\-Tcp* OR *MaxInstanceCount* OR *fEnableWinStation* OR *TSUserEnabled* OR *TSEnabled* OR *TSAppCompat* OR *IdleWinStationPoolCount* OR *TSAdvertise* OR *AllowTSConnections* OR *fSingleSessionPerUser* OR *fDenyTSConnections*)))`
